message: I've throw the django-pdb package up on PyPI - hopefully some of y'all will find will find it a useful little tool.  Contributions & suggestions would be very welcome.

manage.py runserver
    Drops into pdb at the start of a view if the URL includes a 'pdb' GET parameter

manage.py runserver --pdb
    Drops into pdb at the start of every view

manage.py test --pdb
    Drops into pdb on test errors/failures
Hah, this means I can finally get rid of my age-old vim macro to insert "import pdb; pdb.set_trace()" every damn time I need to debug something
Does it have support for ipdb?
@kmmbvnr not yet, but I'm guessing it'll be pretty trivial to add.
@pewpewarrows No probs :) figured it was worth packaging up.
